i am pursuing my law degree.
I like to be alone, but I love my baby.
I'm afraid I'll be unable to keep up with my busy schedule.

content.text: I'm doing well. I'm just finishing up a law degree and I'm a little nervous about starting my career.
Oh, that's exciting! I'm sure you'll do great. What kind of law do you want to practice?
I'm not really sure yet. I'm interested in a lot of different areas.
That's great! You have a lot of options. I'm a teacher and I love it. I get to help kids learn and grow.
That sounds really rewarding. I'm not sure if I could handle being around kids all day.
It's not for everyone, but I love it. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to spend time with my new love and go on long drives. I also like to go to concerts with my boss.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love concerts too. I'm a runner, so I like to go for runs in my free time.
I wish I could run. I'm not very athletic.
You could always start working out. It's never too late to get in shape.
I know. I've been thinking about it.
Well, I'm sure you'll do great at whatever you decide to do.
